name: Serenestadt
description:
It's a cosy sandbox city building game. Create islands and parks. Increase or decrease the size of buildings in your city. Change the colour of trees and bushes.

Features

  • Relaxing and calming gameplay
  • Create cities with lots of green
  • Change the size of buildings
  • Change the colour of trees and bushes

Build and build and build and build.


Buildings in your city can be increased or decreased in size.


Change the colour of trees and bushes.
